title: A cool idea to buff Cassiopeia
body:
Hello! I have seen many other people (besides me) comenting about cass's current state soI wanna talk about how you people feel about Cassiopeia and also give some feedback about what I believe her main issues are and an idea I had to give her a little buff.

 This is what I think are her main issues:

1. She is hard to play, which is fine, I love the challenge! but most times she does not feel rewarding at all compared to mastering Azir, Viktor or even Anivia. She is super situational, and yet, you could be better off without her and pick someone safer.

2. Her kit yells lane bully yet her early got gutted, I still remember the pre-rework level 2 FBs, so yummy. I know this is because riot's new trajectory for her to the late game, where she is supposed to shine. But I think she got gated hard, she is not allowed to punish miss-position or bad plays from her enemies because you will get oom if you casts 4 Es. Seriously, just go some pots and Cass will never kick you out of lane. This can be solved by some Ap regen yellows, but that  denies a defense stat for her like health or armor. She could use a little mana buff imo. 

3. I play cass a lot, and in my experience, the 500 stacks usually caps at 40-43 mins. She is supposed to get this 500 stacks, as her design intends; to make her "the late game monster" as riot said. But games usually end now by 30-35 minutes in my experience, so most of the times (specially if the enemy team got an early lead) Cassiopeia is not allowed to get her late game state. I would say that her cap stack should be 450 stacks to make it a little fair.

So those are the main issues I find with Cassiopeia. I really love the whole late game hyper carry thematic (looking at you {{champion:96}}  <3). And I think Cassiopeia needs something else for her late game... examining Cassiopeia, she plays soo very similar to an adc, though she is rather short ranged... She relies on constant E spam to make damage, much like an AA from an ADC. Now, following this pattern and comparing her to other late game carries like {{champion:67}} and {{champion:96}}, she could use a little health %magic damage.

 Here's my idea:  

At 500 stacks (or 450 if rito-sama allows it) Cassiopeia also deals 3% of the targets maximum health as magic damage with her Q and W with each tick (9% with a full Q), this could give her a nice tool to retiliate back at tanks and iniators that miss-play at locking her down. I don't really think this would be a huge buff to her, but a fair one to make up for her early game nerfs.

What do you guys think? Do you think Cassipeia could need a buff? Be comfortable to give some feedback too!

Because that's what riot wanted, a late game carry. I think the % health damage is a feature of a late game carry, specially with cass mechanics. Riot and the other players hate cass early so it will stay squashed...

Cassiopeia is extremely risky to buff, because she has the potential to be really unhealthy to play against. I mean, how is a lategame hardcarry that can bully you and straight up kill you or force flash if she just lands one Q at lvl 2 (followed by the E spam), balanced?
The concept of lanebully hypercarry is kinda broken, since it's not like she has a huge powerhole midgame anyway.
Her early nerfs were kinda needed to tone down her dominance.
Thinking about straight buffs about your main always looks cool, but tbh it's not really the way to go. Try more around powershifting.

Imo, the thing about Cassiopeia is her rework kinda sucked because she doesn't feel at all like a poison mage, and she actually did before. Now she's more of a : apply poison debuff -> spam EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE for tons of damage.
And R or reverse R (R->flash) to turn around teamfights. That's pretty much it.
I guess she would deserve another rework.

Anyway, damage is not the problem. She melts anybody very fast lategame. Plus %health damage is a really bad mechanic.
